name: SURVIVE (itch) (Designer Cafe)
description:
The game is set in an apocalyptic desert with full of zombies who are waiting to kill any living creature they see. You are one of the survivor of this world. Now you are deployed in this desert and you have to make your way through this desert by completing the task that you would given.

This game has three level and two game mode. One is campaign and the other one is the survival mode. Each of the level have different objective. Just complete the objective to reach the next level.

This project is a prototype of it's original concept. We are launching this prototype now to get real time feedback from gamers as well as developers. We would love to convert the whole concept of this prototype project into a good game with full of entertainment. Although this is our first publication. So, hope you would love it and help us with your opinion to make this project successful.

Presented By

Designer Cafe
